title: go/printer crashes if it encounters a FuncType with nil Params field
body:
The go/ast comment for the FuncType.Params field says that it can be nil if there are no
parameters. However, the go/printer crashes if it is supplied with such a node.

(The go/parser always sets the field (to provide parenthesis position information), but
a program creating a Go AST from scatch may not.)
